forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 58. West wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind 7 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the warmth of the sun gently brushes across the city, yet a veil of marine fog lingers at the edges, hinting at the fickle nature of coastal weather. With temperatures hovering around a distinctive coolness, the atmosphere is surprisingly pleasant—an invitation to stroll along the vibrant streets or perhaps enjoy a moment at one of the cafes that dot the neighborhood. Though the high today might not soar, there’s a serene clarity to the day’s light that captivates as the west winds carry whispers of the ocean.

As twilight approaches, the clouds begin their slow descent, creating a cozy embrace that blends the day into night. The temperatures will dip into the comforting realms of the low fifties, so a light jacket or stylish sweater will serve you well. Tonight promises a soft transition into cloudier skies, perfect for quiet reflection or a leisurely dinner with friends. In this charming embrace of San Francisco's unique weather, one might take pleasure in wandering through galleries or catching a film—simple activities that swirl beautifully in the backdrop of the approaching night.
